question: What is the key objective of "Saathiya Resource Kit" launched by Union Government recently?
option1: To provide information on GST related issues
option2: To provide information on cyber security related issues
option3: To provide information on adolescent related issues
option4: To provide information on insurance related issues
answer: To provide information on adolescent related issues
explanation: C K Mishra, the secretary of Union Ministry of Health and Family Welfare,  has recently launched \"Saathiya Resource Kit\" and \"Saathiya Salah\" Mobile App for adolescents as part of the Rashtriya Kishor Swasthya Karyakram (RKSK) program. The kit and app will help peer educators (Saathiyas) to act as a catalyst for generating demand for the adolescent health services and imparting age appropriate knowledge on key adolescent health issues to their peer groups.
